tool_description: A simple API to calculate monthly mortgage payments, including principal and interest; taxes; homeowners insurance; and mortgage insurance.
name: Mortgage Payments
title: Mortgage Payments

api_list.name: Payments

required_parameters.name: interestRate
required_parameters.description: Annual interest rate expressed as a decimal, e.g. 0.039

optional_parameters.name: assessment
optional_parameters.description: Assessment for tax purposes; if omitted, assumes assessment equal to price.

optional_parameters.name: taxRate
optional_parameters.description: Annual tax rate as a decimal

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Type of mortgage (fix30 or fix15): 30-year or 15-year fixed
